original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ ca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ ca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Nahetusampayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam ca na hetu vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabba
